evidenceCode.label: author statement supported by traceable reference

reference.description:
A heterozygous polymorphism in exon 3 of NPHS1, c.349G>A (p.Glu117Lys), was identified in patient 1. THis is a common polymorphism (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/snp/rs3814995). The other two variants are deemed pathogenic by the authors. 
NM_004646.3:c.928G>A, NP_004637.1(LRG_693p1):p.(Asp310Asn) and NM_004646.3:c.3250dup,NP_004637.1(LRG_693p1):p.(Val1084GlyfsTer12)
